meanings.definition: The process of removing impurities or unwanted elements from a substance.
meanings.sent1: The refinings of the gold ore removed all the dirt and rocks.
meanings.sent2: After the refinings, the oil was pure and ready for use.
meanings.sent3: The refinings of the water were so thorough that even the tiniest impurities were gone.
meanings.sent4: Her refinings of the essay turned it from a rough draft into a polished masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The refinings of the diamond revealed its true brilliance and clarity.

meanings.definition: The result of making something more polished or improved.
meanings.sent1: The refinings of the silver gave it a shiny and flawless appearance.
meanings.sent2: With each refinings, the sculpture became more beautiful and refined.
meanings.sent3: His refinings of the cake decoration made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The refinings of her dance moves made her performance stand out.
meanings.sent5: The refinings of the house's design added elegance and charm to the space.

meanings.definition: The act of making small changes to improve something.
meanings.sent1: Through constant refinings, the recipe became perfect.
meanings.sent2: The refinings of the website layout made it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent3: His refinings of the speech added humor and engagement.
meanings.sent4: The refinings of the strategy led to a significant increase in sales.
meanings.sent5: Her refinings of the painting brought out its true beauty and depth.
